author: intrepid42
body: #### PR description: Adding to TagAndProbe tree: * LHE HT for correct stitching of HT-binned samples * Weights for ME scale variations (can replace statistically limited MG vs aMCatNLO comparisons) * Weights for PS scale variations #### PR validation: Compiles in 11_2, no working EGM config available, unfortunately. Validated and used in 10_2 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_10_2_X...intrepid42:TnP_102X): ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1311783/98806213-1fba0880-2419-11eb-9393-2ae964dbdf12.png) @jainshilpi
title: Add LHE HT and generator weights to TagAndProbe tree
